items.title: Shock as Kenyan lawyer killed in drive-by shooting in Nairobi
items.description: Kyalo Mbobu was driving home when a gunman on a motorbike shot him dead on a busy street in the capital.

items.title: Nepal protests 'hijacked', Gen Z claim, as army patrols the streets
items.description: Fierce protests against corruption and nepotism spiralled into arson and violence on Tuesday.

items.title: Watch: Mandelson says he regrets falling for Epstein's lies
items.description: Watch: Mandelson says he regrets falling for Epstein's lies

items.title: Woman who bit off attacker's tongue acquitted after 61 years
items.description: Choi Mal-ja only managed to break free after biting off about 1.5cm of her alleged attacker's tongue.

items.title: Hamas claims leadership survived Israeli attack in Doha, but confirms six deaths
items.description: Meanwhile, the White House says the Israeli strike "does not advance Israel or America's goals".
